headline: Assessing Whether Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Shares Look Overvalued After Recent Weak Price Performance
summary: Why Intuitive Surgical is on investors’ radar today Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) continues to draw attention after recent share price moves, with the stock down around 1% over the past day and about 6% over the past week. Those short term returns add to a month decline of roughly 8%, while performance over the past 3 months is roughly flat. This gives investors a mixed recent picture to weigh against the company’s longer track record. See our latest analysis for Intuitive Surgical. At a share...
